Headline: #79 79th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Prairie
ShortDescription: Eastbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, State, 76th and King Drive: due to, street blockage near 79th/Prairie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, State, 76th and King Drive: due to, street blockage near 79th/Prairie.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
